hero.name: Gaby
hero.description: Elevating brands with strategic ad campaigns and social media mastery.

services.section_desc: Complete digital marketing solutions tailored to grow your business and enhance your online presence.

items.title: Facebook Ads
items.desc: Targeted ad campaigns that convert. From audience research to retargeting strategies and ROAS optimization.

items.title: Google Ads
items.desc: Maximize visibility with high-intent search campaigns, display networks, and YouTube advertising.

items.title: Social Media Strategy
items.desc: Comprehensive planning to align social content with your business goals and brand voice.

items.title: Community Management
items.desc: Engaging with your audience, handling inquiries, and building a loyal community around your brand.

items.title: Content Design
items.desc: Creating visually stunning posts and stories using tools like Canva and Photoshop.

items.title: Metrics & Reporting
items.desc: Data-driven insights with detailed monthly reports to track growth and campaign performance.

roles.title: Senior Media Buyer
roles.desc: Managing $50k+ monthly ad spend across Meta and Google platforms. Achieving constant ROAS improvement for e-commerce clients.

roles.title: Social Media Manager
roles.desc: Full-stack social media management for 10+ clients. Content strategy, community engagement, and growth hacking.

roles.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
roles.desc: Led digital transformation initiatives, including SEO optimization and email marketing campaigns.

portfolio.section_desc: Check out some select projects where I've helped brands grow their online presence.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: Gaby transformed our ad strategy completely. We saw a 3x increase in ROAS within the first month. Her expertise in Facebook Ads is unmatched.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: The community management and content design provided by Gaby has given our brand a professional and engaging voice. Highly recommended!

items.name: Emily Davis
items.content: Working with Gaby is a breeze. She is data-driven, creative, and always delivers on time. Her monthly reports provide clear insights into our growth.

contact.section_desc: Ready to scale your business with expert media buying and social media strategies? Let's chat about your goals.
